Texts.Eng: Stop the cultists from corrupting the Forest of Fae.

Texts.Chs: 这份来自邪教徒的地图上显示出一个美丽的森林星球即将遭受破坏，我应该阻止他们的行为……
Texts.Eng: The cultists' map shows a certain beautiful forest planet which they're trying to corrupt. There's also a whole load of loot stored there, too. I could try and crash their party...

Texts.Chs: 伴随着邪教徒的死亡，森林也恢复了平静。
Texts.Eng: With the cultists gone, hopefully the forest will recover in time. Either way, my job here is done.
